<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207116</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">San Antonio Missions: Spanish Influence in Texas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">San Antonio Missionen: Spanisch beeinflußt 
in Texas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Missions de San Antonio : Les Espagnols 
influencent dans le Texas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Missões Do San Antonio: Os espanhóis 
influenciam em Texas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Missioni Di San Antonio: Gli Spagnoli 
influenzano nel Texas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αποστολές SAN Antonio: Ισπανική επιρροή στο
Τέξας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Misiones Del San Antonio: Los españoles 
influencian en Tejas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Explores a group of 18th-century missions in modern San Antonio to learn about the Spanish influence on native peoples and the patterns of Texas culture. Students can learn about the psychological and cultural factors that led the Coahuiltecan Indians to accept mission life and how irrigation systems, such as acequias, assisted in the development of Texas farmland and other arid areas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erforscht eine Gruppe Missionen 18th-century in 
modernem San Antonio, um über den spanischen Einfluß auf gebürtige 
Völker zu erlernen und die Muster der Texas Kultur. 
Kursteilnehmer können über das psychologische erlernen und 
kulturelle Faktoren das führten die Coahuiltecan Inder, das Mission 
Leben anzunehmen und wie Bewässerungsysteme, wie acequias, 
unterstützt in der Entwicklung des Texas Ackerlands und anderer 
trockener Bereiche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Explore un groupe de missions 18th-century dans 
San moderne Antonio pour se renseigner sur l'influence espagnole 
sur les indigènes et les configurations de la culture du Texas. 
Les étudiants peuvent se renseigner sur le psychologique et les
facteurs culturels cela ont mené les Indiens de Coahuiltecan à 
recevoir la vie de mission et comment des systèmes d'irrigation, tels
que des acequias, aidés au développement des champs du Texas et 
d'autres zones arides.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Explora um grupo das missões 18th-century em San 
moderno Antonio para aprender sobre a influência espanhola em povos 
nativos e os testes padrões da cultura de Texas. Os estudantes 
podem aprender sobre o psicológico e os fatores cultural isso 
conduziram aos indians de Coahuiltecan aceitar a vida da missão e 
como sistemas de irrigação, tais como os acequias, ajudados no 
desenvolvimento da terra de Texas e de outras áreas arid.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esplora un gruppo delle missioni 18th-century in 
San moderno Antonio per imparare circa l'influenza spagnola sulle 
popolazioni autoctone ed i modelli della coltura del Texas. Gli 
allievi possono imparare circa lo psicologico ed i fattori culturali 
quello hanno condotto gli indiani di Coahuiltecan accettare la vita di
missione e come gli impianti di irrigazione, quali i acequias, hanno 
aiutato nello sviluppo del terreno coltivabile del Texas e di altre 
zone aride.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερευνά μια ομάδα αποστολών 18$ος-αιώνα στο σύγχρονο 
SAN Antonio για να μάθει για την ισπανική επιρροή στους 
εγγενείς λαούς και τα πρότυπα του πολιτισμού του Τέξας. Οι 
σπουδαστές μπορούν να μάθουν για τους ψυχολογικούς και 
πολιτιστικούς παράγοντες που οδήγησαν το Coahuiltecan Ινδοί για
να αποδεχθούν τη ζωή αποστολής και πώς τα συστήματα άρδευσης, 
όπως τα acequias, βοήθησαν στην ανάπτυξη του καλλιεργήσιμου 
εδάφους του Τέξας και άλλων ξηρών περιοχών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Explora un grupo de las misiones 18th-century en 
San moderno Antonio para aprender sobre la influencia española en 
indígenas y los modelos de la cultura de Tejas. Los estudiantes
pueden aprender sobre el psicologico y los factores culturales eso 
condujeron a indios de Coahuiltecan a validar vida de la misión y 
cómo los sistemas de irrigación, tales como acequias, asistidos al 
desarrollo de las tierras de labrantío de Tejas y de otras áreas 
áridas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207116</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104436</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/san-antonio-missions-spanish-influence-in-texas</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
